item.description:
Due to the Holiday and weather remaining cool, I have decided to advance the second tennis meetup to Tuesday April 10th . Hope this change is conducive to all?

I have located an area in Medford with 5 courts newly paved and nets up !!
the area is near the mystic lakes on the winchester/ medford line.

I hope to post a map it's right off rt. 93 about 10-15 minutes from boston.

Hope you all enjoy the easter and passover weekend ahead

if any questions and opinions please feel free to contact me at laf620@rcn.com

Take Care
Hope to see more RSVP's

Laura
item.name: STILL TOO COLD FOR OUTSIDE TENNIS ??!!
